modules.description: This module converts between float triples and various color space records like HSLUV, HPLUV, RGB, XYZ, LUV, and LCH. Each function pair maps a specific color model's components to and from a tuple of floats. It supports precise color representation and interchange in applications like graphics rendering, color space transformations, and visualization tools.

This library facilitates precise color representation and transformation across perceptually uniform color spaces like HSLuv and HPLuv, alongside device-dependent models such as RGB and XYZ, using distinct record types with floating-point components to enforce type-safe conversions. It enables applications requiring accurate color interpolation, human-friendly color adjustments, or cross-format serialization (e.g., hex strings) by exposing both high-level conversions and low-level transformation primitives. The structured approach ensures robust handling of color data in domains like UI design, image processing, or data visualization where semantic clarity and conversion reliability are critical.
